Posts.Content: After removal of left breast through surgery, Dr. recommends chemeo! How important is chemeo and what if chemeo is not done, the age of patient is 60 years, diabetic and blood pressure. Is there any blood test that can confirm the cancerous cells
Posts.Title: Chemeotherapy for breast cancer

Posts.Content: Thank you very much, do you have names of the BLOOD TESTS, which can confirm the presence of cancerous cells in the body? I will appreciate if you can list them all
Posts.Title: Chemeotherapy for breast cancer
